title: EVC et PDA/VCA and POA du Kouritbilyargo
descriptionlocal: Le EVC a révélé des problèmes d'eau et d'assainissement, l'isolement de la communauté et des problèmes de dégradation des sols.
description: The VCA revealed water and sanitation issues, isolation of the community, and soil degradation issues.

title: EVC et PDA/VCA and POA du Village de Tin Akoff
descriptionlocal: La communauté fait face à de l'insécurité alimentaire, des incendies saisonniers et des problèmes d'eau et d'assainissement.
description: The community is facing food insecurity, fires and water and sanitation issues.

title: EVC et PDA/VCA and POA du Village de Karma
descriptionlocal: La communauté est confrontée à de l'insécurité alimentaire, des inondations, des problèmes politiques, des maladies, des problèmes reliés à l'eau et à l'assainissement.
description: The community is facing food insecurity, flood, political issues, water access issues and diseases.

title: EVC et PDA/VCA and POA du Village de Beldiabé
descriptionlocal: La communauté est confrontée à de l'insécurité alimentaire, à des inondations, à des difficultées d'accès à l'eau et à des infrastructures d'assainissement.
description: The community is facing food insecurity, floods, access to sanitation and water.

title: EVC et PDA/VCA and POA du Village de Kassam-Ouest
descriptionlocal: La communauté est confrontée à de l'insécurité alimentaire, à des inondations, à la dégradation des terres (sables) et à des problèmes liés à l'eau.
description: The community is facing food insecurity, floods, land degradation (sands) and water issues.

title: EVC et PDA/VCA and POA du Village de Loungho
descriptionlocal: La communauté est confrontée à une situation d'insécurité alimentaire, des problèmes d'eau et d'assainissement, des inondations et des maladies.
description: The community is facing food insecurity, WASH, floods and disease.

title: EVC et PDA/VCA and POA du Village de Pella
descriptionlocal: La communauté fait face à de l'insécurité alimentaire, des problèmes reliés à l'éducation, à l'eau et à des inondations.
description: The community is facing food insecurity, lack of education, water management issues, floods.

title: EVC et PDA/VCA and POA du Village de Rouko
descriptionlocal: La communauté fait face à de l'insécurité alimentaire, des inondations, et des problèmes liés à l'eau et à l'assainissement.
description: The community is facing food insecurity, floods, WASH issues.

title: EVC et PDA/VCA and POA du Village de Souryala
descriptionlocal: La communauté est confrontée à de l'insécurité alimentaire, des inondations, des problèmes d'eau et d'accès aux soins de santé. Le EVC met également l'accent sur les questions relatives aux femmes et à l'emploi.
description: The community is facing food insecurity, floods, water issues, access to health care is also an issue. The VCA also highlight women and employment related issues.

title: EVC et PDA/VCA and POA du Village de Tebla
descriptionlocal: La communauté fait face à des maladies, de l'insécurité alimentaire, des problèmes d'éducation et la dégradation des terres.
description: The community is facing disease, food insecurity, lack of education and land degradation.

title: Urban VCA and POA of Yaoundé
description: This urban VCA in the Sixth Subdivision of Yaoundé identified many risks affecting the population such as floods, water-borne diseases, insufficient livelihoods and an inefficient risk and disaster management system.
comments: This VCA is a good example of the challenges of analysing vulnerabilities and capacities with city dwellers in a large area exposed to many risks. It presents a number of constraints and lessons learned and also recommends some preconditions before doing the study in an urban context, such as conducting humanitarian diplomacy activities and disseminating Red Cross principles among the authorities.

title: Urban VCA and POA of quarters in Abidjan
community: Tomber mort and Akéïkoi quarters, Abidjan
description: Urban VCA in two quarters of Côte d'Ivoire's capital city, shows some of the challenges of analysing risk and vulnerability in cities

title: Urban VCA and POA of Arada sub-city in Addis Ababa
community: Arada Sub-city Woreda 4 and 5, Addis Ababa
description: This VCA in the urban setting of the Arada sub-city of Addis Ababa, identified floods and heavy rains as the main disaster-related risks and poor living conditions and access to basic services, such as health and sanitation, as factors increasing their risk.
comments: This VCA is a good example of an extensive review of secondary information, which was done in partnership with a local university. It also showcases challenges and the potentialities of the current disaster risk reduction assessment tools employed to have an overall picture of risk, vulnerabilities and coping mechanisms in urban areas in Ethiopia.

title: EVC et PDA/VCA and POA du Damissakoro
descriptionlocal: La communauté est confrontée à des problèmes d'éducation avec un haut taux d'analphabétisme et un manque de formation adequate en matière de construction. De plus, la gestion de l'eau, la santé et les questions agricoles ont été identifiées comme risques.
description: The community faces education issues with a high illiteracy rateand lack of knowledge on safe construction practices. Furthermore, poor water management, limited knowledge on health  and agricultural issues have been identified as important underlying causes of risk.
comments: Cette EVC est un bon exemple d'une analyse détaillée du contexte avec des informations sur l'histoire du village, y compris des explications sur le sous-groupe dans le village et une bonne analyse des données secondaires./ This VCA is a good example of a detailed context analysis with information on the history of the village including explanations on the sub-group within the village and good secondary data analysis.

title: EVC et PDA/VCA and POA du Nounkounkan
descriptionlocal: Les principaux risques évalués par cette communauté sont les inondations, les invasions d'insectes ravageurs et les maladies qui affectent le bétail.
description: The main risks assessed by this community are floods, pest invasion and cattle sickness.
comments: Ce EVC est un exemple d'une bonne analyse des données fournies par les outils, il lie spécifiquement les vulnérabilités identifiées aux outils utilisés./This VCA is an example of good analysis of the data provided by the tools, it specifically links the vulnerabilities identified to the tools used.

title: AVC e PDA/VCA and POA da Bissora, Guinea-Bissau
descriptionlocal: A comunidade de Bissora identificou saúde, água e saneamento e agricultura como áreas-chave para focar, melhorar suas capacidades e reduzir suas vulnerabilidades.
description: The community of Bissora identified health, water and sanitation and agriculture as the key areas to focus on, to improve their capacities and reduce their vulnerabilities

title: POA of Biliqo, Merti Division, Merti District.
description: The communities of Biliqo and Bulesa have created a detailed action plan to create a grazing committee to improve awareness and to oversee the grazing agreement

title: VCA and POA of Gambela, Murere Division, Tigania East District
community: Gambela, Murere Division, Tigania East District
description: The village of Gambela has identified its main risks as conflict, food and water shortage and disease and has developed an action plan to tackle these issues.

title: VCA and POA of Gotu, East Division of Isiolo County
community: Gotu, East Division of Isiolo County
description: The community of Gotu has identified insecurity, diseases, illiteracy, child marriage and malnutrition as their key priorities for action.

title: VCA and POA of Kinna, Garbatulla District
description: The community of Kinna is severely affected by drought, diseases and pastoral conflicts and they have identified actions such as creating a peace and grazing committee to address the conflict.

title: VCA and POA of Korbesa, Cherab division
description: This community identified the mathenge trees as an issues along with diseases, ticks and water and food shortages. The Korbesa community updated their previous plan of action to reflect these new priorities.

title: VCA and POA of Lebarsherik, Oldonyiro Division, Garbatulla District.
description: This community identified shortage of water, drought, food insecurity and lack of health services as the main priorities to address and planned actions to reduce its vulnerability to them.
comments: This VCA is an example of good practice since the community of Lebarsherik was taken through various approaches to build their existing capacities on the subject of climate change and ecosystem restoration and management.

title: VCA and POA of Malkadaka, Garbatulla Division, Garbatulla District.
description: Flash floods and drought are the main hazards the Malkadaka community faces. The community ranked its main risks and developed an action plan to address the top six issues. Furthermore, tasks were assigned to several members of the community to ensure the commitment to the process of implementation.

title: Urban VCA and POA of Lunga Lunga informal settlement, Nairobi
description: The VCA of the Lunga Lunga informal settlement found the community was vulnerable to several hazards such as fire, insecurity, drug and substance abuse, floods, poor drainage system, eviction threats, early pregnancy, water shortage and prostitution.
comments: This VCA is a good example of a holistic VCA that identifies risks from a multi-sector perspective. In addition, it also has a very detailed plan of action.

title: VCA and POA of the communities of Maqoala, Malebanye
description: The communities of Maqoala and Malebanye identified many different risks which they are exposed to and developed actions plans to transform their vulnerabilities into capacities.
comments: The VCA done by the communities of Maqoala and Malebanye is an example of good practice in several aspects. It has a good context analysis with use of secondary information. It is also a holistic VCA that takes into account all the different sectors. It also shows a good use and analysis of several tools. Finally, it has a well developed action plan that follows a prioritisation  of issues and CIT (Change, Influence, Transformation) analysis.

title: VCA of informal settlements Chipasula/Kaliyeka, Mchesi and Kawale I & II in Lilongue, Malawi
community: Chipasula/Kaliyeka, Mchesi and Kawale I & II, Lilongue
description: This Urban VCA shows the communities living in informal settlements and shantytowns are particularly vulnerable to extreme events such as riverine floods and strong winds. However, as an urban community, this community also identified basic infrastructure available which can be improved and used in the event of disasters.
comments: This is a good example of the use of tools and analysis from a multisector point of view and of engagement of different stakeholders in cities.

title: EVC/VCA du Kounari, Fakala and Madiama
descriptionlocal: L'EVC identifie les risques auxquels les communautés de Kounari, Fakala et Madiama sont confrontées à cause des changements climatiques et de problèmes agricoles.
description: This VCA in the communities of Kounari, Fakala and Madiama identifies the risks they face in relation to climate change and agricultural issues.
comments: Ce EVC se concentre sur la sécurité alimentaire et l'adaptation au changement climatique. C'est aussi un exemple d'une bonne méthodologie et d'une évaluation sectorielle des risques et des vulnérabilités. En outre, il présente une excellente révision des données secondaires sur les produits agricoles et des changements climatiques./This VCA focuses on food security and climate change adaptation. It is also an example of a good methodology and sectorial assessment of risks and vulnerabilities. In addition, it has an excellent review of agricultural secondary data and climate change information.

title: EVC et PDA/VCA and POA du Village Bakao
descriptionlocal: La petite communauté de Bakao a identifié les principaux risques auxquels elle est confrontée; le manque d'accès a des infrastructure de santé, d'eau et d'assainissement et le manque de moyens de subsistance.
description: The small community of Bakao identified the main risks it is facing as poor health, water and sanitation issues and livelihood issues.

title: EVC/VCA du Village Leeleibatt, Brakna
descriptionlocal: Les problèmes de santé et particulièrement de santé des femmes, les problèmes agricoles et les problèmes liés à l'éducation sont les principaux risques identifiés par la communauté de Leeleibatt.
description: Health issues and especially women's health issues, agricultural and educational issues are the main risks identified by the Leeleibatt community.

title: EVC et PDA/VCA and POA du Village Moundy
descriptionlocal: La communauté de Moundy fait face à des risques liés à l'isolement géographique, à l'eau et à l'assainissement, ainsi que des problèmes de santé.
description: The Moundy community faces risks linked to geographic isolation, water and sanitation issues as well as, health issues.

title: EVC et PDA/VCA and POA du Rufisque
descriptionlocal: La communauté de Ndar Gou Ndaw a identifié les inondations et le manque d'emploi comme les plus grands risques auxquels elle est confrontée et a préparé de nombreuses actions pour minimiser ces risques.
description: The community of Ndar Gou Ndaw idenfied flooding and lack of employment as the biggest risks it faces and prepared many actions to transform these risks.
comments: Cette EVC constitue un bon exemple d'utilisation de l'arbre à problèmes./This VCA constitutes a good practice example of the use of the problem tree.

title: EVC et PDA/VCA and POA du Guinaw Rails Nord
descriptionlocal: Les principaux risques rencontrés dans cette communauté sont liés à la gestion de l'eau et des déchets. De plus, le taux de chômage élevé semble créer une hausse de violence. Finalement, le système de gestion des catastrophes n'est pas suffisant.
description: The main risks this community encountered are linked to water and waste management. The low unemployment rate is also creating risk of violence. In addition,  the disaster management system is not sufficient.
comments: Cette EVC est un bon exemple de l'utilisation d'une large gamme d'outils, y compris un historique détaillé et calendrier saisonnier./This VCA is a good example of the use of  a broad range of tools, including good historical and seasonal calendars.

title: EVC et PDA/VCA and POA du Rosso
descriptionlocal: Ce processus EVC s'est concentré principalement sur la propagation de maladies et sur le manque de formations disponibles pour les jeunes.
description: This VCA process focused mainly on the issues of propagation of sickness and the youth's lack of training.

title: EVC et PDA/VCA and POA du Dagana
descriptionlocal: Ces communautés ont souligné des problèmes liés à l'emploi des jeunes et à la sécurité alimentaire.
description: These communities highlighted  youth unemployment and food insecurity issues as the main issues facing the community .
comments: Ce EVC est un bon exemple de l'utilisation d'une large gamme d'outils, y compris l'arbres à problèmes et l'historique. Il comprend également des données secondaires de qualité notamment sur la sécurité alimentaire./This VCA is a good example of the use of a wide range of tools including problem trees and historical calendar. It also has good secondary data that includes food security vulnerability data and focus group discussions were conducted with the youth, elderly and women.

title: EVC et PDA/VCA and POA du Gae
descriptionlocal: Cette EVC a été réalisé dans 6 quartiers. Il a permis d'identifier des problèmes liés aux maladies et à la gestion de l'eau.
description: This VCA that was done by 6 neighbourhoods which identified water-borne disease and livelihood issues as the main risks the communities are exposed to.

title: VCA of 19 Communities in Kono District
description: This VCA found that most of the communities in Kono District lack access to safe drinking water, do not have latrines nor health facilities. Such conditions make them highly vulnerable to skin infections, dysentery and malaria among other diseases.
comments: This case will be of interest to those with focused programmes and very limited time and resources. It constitutes a minimal use of VCA. The only information collected was that required to fill in the log frame. In this context “vulnerability” took on the limited meaning of “need” or “deficiency” and questions about “capacity” did not extend to organizational and institutional dimensions or problem solving ability.

title: Urban VCA of Kigogo Mkwajuni and Hananasifu wards in Dar es Salaam
community: Kigogo Mkwajuni and Hananasifu wards, Dar es Salaam
description: The communities of Kigogo Mkwajuni and Hananasifu face a high risk of floods due to their location in the Msimbazi and Ngo’mbe river valley and the lak of urban development planning.  Measures to face this risk have been planned,  examples are moving houses at risk and cleaning the ditches to allow water to flow.
comments: This urban VCA in a high risk area for flooding, reflects some of the challenges with the application of some tools such as the historical profiles and seasonal calendar. It also shows how term community is again different in comparison with the geographically defined rural community. An urban population contains within it a multitude of sub-groups.

title: Urban VCA of Dzivaresekwa and Hatcliffe, Harare North District
community: Dzivaresekwa and  Hatcliffe, Harare North District
description: This VCA in the suburban context of Dzivaresekwa and Hatcliffe highlights issues in the area of health,  such as typhoid and cholera outbreaks. In addition, pressing issues related to water and sanitation exist, including lack of access to clean water and inadequate toilet facilities in public places.

title: Urban VCA of Dzivaresekwa and  Hatcliffe, Harare North District
community: Dzivaresekwa and  Hatcliffe, Harare North District
description: This VCA in the suburban context of Dzivaresekwa and Hatcliffe highlights issues in the area of health,  such as typhoid and cholera outbreaks. In addition, pressing issues related to water and sanitation exist, including lack of access to clean water and inadequate toilet facilities in public places.

title: VCA of Bendals, Antigua.
description: The community of Bendals which has experienced many hurricanes 1995 Luis, 1998 Georges,  1999 Lenny, 2008 Omar and 2009 Earl, has identified their capacities to respond to them.

title: VCA of Codrington, Barbuda
description: Due to the frequent hurricanes the community of Codrington is generally very prepared for these events. Therefore, it decided to focus on enhancing the rest of the island’s preparation.

title: VCA and POA of Arthur's Town, Cat Island
description: Arthur's Town has identified the biggest risks the community faces related to hurricanes as flooding, destruction of homes and roofs and contamination.

title: VCA and POA of Fox Hill, Nassau, New Providence
description: This community identified trees as one of the main hazards. Tall trees hovering over lamp poles and wires and cotton tree roots and cotton trees intruding in the main access route to the community are identified as important threats.

title: VCA and POA of South Eleuthera
description: Wemyss Bight, Deep Creek, Bannerman Town and Waterford are low lying communities and subject to flooding in the event of a heavy down pour of rain or a hurricane. These communities also have an abundance of old derelict vehicles and old appliances which could increase the rodents in the communities.

title: VCA and POA of Charles Rowe Bridge
description: Facing a high risk of flooding the community of Charles Rowe Bridge has developed a proposal to reduce flooding through regular maintenance of the drains and educational programs.
comments: This VCA is an example of good practice in terms of its detailed analysis of the tools applied and the development of a good project proposal.

title: VCA and POA of Martin's Bay
description: The community of Martin's Bay plans to tackle poor drainage issues by carrying out a clean-up campaign and educating the community on waste disposal methods.
comments: This VCA is an example of good practice in its detailed secondary data analysis, use of tools and identification of actions done by the community.  It also ensured participation of different stakeholders and has a holistic approach

title: VCA and POA of Cochrane
description: The community of Cochrane is surrounded by the volcanic sites of Morne Trois Piton, Morne Micotrin and Morne Watt.  Alike most areas in Dominica there are risks of landslides and sporadic road blocks when torrential down pour is experienced.

title: VCA and POA of Laudat
description: In order to reduce the risks caused by landslides the community of Laudet decided to plan better road works, implement proper and correct techniques to help heavy rainfall and improve the self sufficiency of the community to last until the road is cleared.

title: VCA and POA of Clozier
description: Through the mapping exercise this VCA identified a very important issue in this community: one of its biggest capacities, the community centre which is also the only emergency shelter and medical facility, can become hazardous in a disaster situation, as it is in an area that is not only prone to, but has active land movement.

title: VCA and POA of Mount Rich
description: This VCA process shows that hurricanes are the main concern of Mount Rich residents in terms of disasters. Since most houses are of wooden structure and thus, particularly vulnerable to high winds, the need for community shelter is high, the community centre plays this function but is vulnerable to floods, the main priority of this community is to construct a drain around the community centre.

title: VCA and POA of Petite Martinique
description: This community identified the distance to professional rescue operation centres as one of its key vulnerability. It is very likely that in case of a major disaster, Petit Martiniquais will need to take care of themselves before professional rescuers can access the island. For this reason, they decided to design a microproject to equip the health centre to make it more resilient, and better prepared to serve as an emergency centre in case of a disaster.

title: VCA and POA of River Sallee
description: A clean up campaign of the river and building a concrete pathway and a storage room for the disaster response kits are the main actions the community decided to take to reduce their vulnerability.

title: POA of White Horses, St Thomas parish
description: Having  identified the main hazards affecting the community as earthquakes, hurricanes and floods the community's action plan focuses on early warning, evacuation, shelter and post-hurricane relief among others.
comments: This POA is an example of a POA developed after a VCA with a specific focus on hazards and early warning. Thus, the structure is different form the traditional VCA.

title: VCA of Bullock Heights, Somerton
description: Faced with hurricanes and flooding, this community identified actions to educate and raise awareness and actions to contour land to direct the flow of water and desilt the river that run long side the housing scheme to transform their vulnerabilities into capacities.

title: VCA and POA of Claverty Cottage, Portland
description: The remote community of Claverty Cottage identified hurricanes, floods, earthquakes, soil erosion and landslides as the main hazards they are exposed to.

title: VCA of New Town, Saint Kitts
description: Flooding, sea surges and risk of fires and explosions due to industrial accidents are the main hazards identified in New Town, Saint Kitts.

title: VCA and POA of Babonneau, Hill 20, La Croix and Balata
community: Babonneau, Hill 20, La Croix and Balata
description: In Babonneau, the community determined fire, floods, hurricanes and a variety of different health issues as the main hazards it is exposed to. It also planned many actions to tackle its vulnerability to these.
comments: This VCA is an example of good practice in its identification of the key social groups such as, day-care, youth groups, shops, bar, mother & father groups, schools and preschools, as the influential players in the community that should be focused on in order to implement the Plan of Action. It also show a good use and analysis of the different tools.

title: VCA and POA of Desbarras
description: Of great concern for the community of Desbarras, is the vulnerability of its mayor physical resources. The access road and the church are prone to landslides and the main bridge is prone to flooding.

title: VCA and POA of Forestiere
description: The community of Forestiere designed an action plan to tackle its main vulnerabilities; landslides, criminal activity, overhanging trees and extreme fast driving.

title: VCA and POA of Ti Rocher
description: To respond to the hazards of landslides, the community plans to build retaining wall and fix gabion baskets near the gas station, run an education campaign and apply  protective measures. It also assists community members in developing emergency family plans and establishes agreements with heavy equipment operators and bus drivers to use vehicles if a landslide occurs.

title: VCA ofBamboo village,  Caroni
description: The community of Bamboo village highlighted its vulnerabilities and capacities to face hurricanes, diabetes and hypertension, HIV/AIDS, drug use and flooding as the key hazards that affect it.

title: VCA and POA of Speyside Community
description: The community of Speyside identified climate change, sea level rise,  hurricanes, disease and waste as some of their priority issues to tackle.
comments: This is a very detailed and extensive report of the VCA process in Speyside. It includes a thorough analysis of secondary information, a good use and analysis of different VCA tools. It is also a holistic VCA as it focusses on the issues in the community across sectors and develops plans of action for all these issues. Finally, it also incorporates climate change considerations.

title: VCA and POA of Ladyville
description: The outcome of this VCA process was the realisation by the community of the need to form parents clubs, youth groups and even upper division school children groups to train the groups in positive relationships and parenting skills as most of the above problems identified stemmed from poor family education.

title: VCA and POA of Caledonia
description: Flooding, hurricanes, fuel explosions and contamination are some of the hazards identified by the community in Caledonia.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA de La Lima de San Nicolás, Cartago
community: La Lima de San Nicolás, Cartago
descriptionlocal: El proceso de AVC en la comunidad de Santa Rosa de la Lima muestra los desafíos que enfrenta una comunidad cada vez más urbanizada, donde las redes sociales se están volviendo más dinámicas y los problemas, como la gestión de residuos, se vuelven más complejos.
description: The VCA process in the community of Santa Rosa de la Lima shows the challenges faced by a community that is becoming increasingly urbanised, where the social networks are becoming more dynamic and the problems more complex, such as that of waste management.
comments: Este es un ejemplo de una buenas prácticas en el proceso AVC. Se utilizaron siete herramientas diferentes acompañadas de un buen análisis de los resultados. También contiene un plan de acción bien desarrollado./This is an example of a good practice, it uses seven different tools and presents a good description and analysis of the results. It also contains a well developed action plan.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA de Linda Vista, Rio Azul, San Jose
community: Linda Vista, Rio Azul, San Jose
descriptionlocal: La comunidad de Linda Vista identificó casas mal construidas en pendientes como una de las principales vulnerabilidades a terremotos y deslizamientos de tierra y acciones planeadas como la creación de un sistema de control de permisos de construcción en pendientes.
description: The community of Linda Vista identified badly constructed houses on slopes as one of the main vulnerabilities to earthquakes and landslides and planned actions such as creating a control system for construction permits in slopes.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA de El Meco, Ciudad Quesada
descriptionlocal: Frente a un alto riesgo de deslizamientos de tierra y la existencia de casas construidas en pendientes por encima de los 45 ° esta comunidad planea reubicar a la población a un área más segura.
description: Faced with high risk of landslides and having houses built on slopes above 45° this community plans to relocate the population to a safer area.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA del Caserío San Juan Las Minas, Planes de La Laguna
community: Comunidad del caserío San Juan Las Minas, cantón Planes de La Laguna, Santa Ana
descriptionlocal: La comunidad de San Juan Las Minas, afectada por una erupción volcánica en 2005, identificó los torrentes de agua que llevan escombros y los deslizamientos de tierra como los principales peligros a los que enfrentan.
description: The community of San Juan Las Minas was affected by a volcanic eruption in 2005 and now identified torrents of water carrying debris and landslides as the main hazards at that moment.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA de Anexo 4 de Febrero Zona 7
descriptionlocal: La gestión de residuos, los deslizamientos de tierra y el comsumo de drogas son los principales problemas identificados por la comunidad del Anexo 4 de Febrero.
description: Waste management, landslides and drugs are the main issues identified by the community of Anexo 4 de Febrero.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA de Nuestra Señora del Carmen Zona 12
community: 12 Colonia: Nuestra Señora del Carmen Zona 12, Guatemala
descriptionlocal: Este AVC muestra un ejemplo interesante de una comunidad que solía ser un asentamiento informal y ahora es un asentamiento oficial de la ciudad de Guatemala.
description: This VCA shows an interesting example of a community that used to be an informal settlement and now is an official settlement of Guatemala city.

title: AVC/VCA de Puerta del Jardín, Zona 18
descriptionlocal: Los principales peligros identificados por la comunidad de El Jardin son los deslizamientos de tierra, la inestabilidad de la ruta de acceso y la contaminación ambiental.
description: The main hazards identified by the community of El Jardin are landslides, the unstable access route and environmental pollution.

title: AVC/VCA de Mojanales
descriptionlocal: La comunidad de Mojanales identificó sus principales riesgos relacionados con las inundaciones del río Motagua y la falta de agua potable.
description: The community of Mojanales identified its main hazards as flooding from the river Motagua and lack of drinking water.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA de Anexo Forestal Zona 13
descriptionlocal: Debido a su ubicación en un barranco que termina en el río de aguas residuales y a que las casas se construyeron en posición vertical, la comunidad de Anexo Forestal enfrenta un serio riesgo de colapso y la evacuación sería muy difícil. Por lo que decidieron que es crucial tomar las medidas necesarias para una evacuación eficiente.
description: Due to its location on a ravine ending in river of sewage and the houses being in a somewhat vertical position, the community of Anexo Forestal faces a serious risk of collapse and a very difficult ability to evacuate. Thus it decided it was crucial to take the necessary measures for an efficient evacuation.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA de la Colonia Canaan de la Ciudad de Tegucigalpa
community: La Colonia Canaan de la Ciudad de Tegucigalpa
descriptionlocal: Los terremotos, las inundaciones, la contaminación y la inseguridad son los principales peligros a los que se enfrenta este asentamiento. La falta de infraestructura y la construcción de casas de madera en pendientes son algunas de sus principales vulnerabilidades.
description: Earthquakes, floods, pollution and insecurity are the main hazards this settlement faces. The lack of infrastructure and the construction of wooden houses on slopes are some of its main vulnerabilities.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA de la Colonia Nueva Esperanza de la Ciudad de Comayaguela
community: La Colonia Nueva Esperanza de la Ciudad de Comayaguela
descriptionlocal: El asentamiento de Nueva Esperanza fue severamente afectado por el huracán Mitch en 1998, ya que la falta de infraestructura de un asentamiento informal es una de las principales vulnerabilidades de la comunidad.
description: The Nueva Esperanza settlement, which was severely affected by Hurricane Mitch in 1998, identified that, due to its status as an informal settlement, the lack of infrastructure as one of its main vulnerabilities.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA de Los Terrones, El Paraíso
descriptionlocal: Los principales peligros identificados por la comunidad de El Terrón son las inundaciones, las sequías y la contaminación.
description: The main hazards identified by the community of El Terron are floods, droughts and pollution.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA de El Zamorano, El Paraíso
descriptionlocal: La comunidad de El Zamorano fue elegida debido a su elevada vulnerabilidad a la sequía, aumenta a medida que la región experimenta menos lluvia durante el invierno y veranos más largos que causan graves daños a la ya frágil economía.
description: The community of El Zamorano was chosen due to its high vulnerability to drought which is increasing as the area is experiencing less rain during winter and longer summers which causes serious damage to the already fragile economy.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA de Poblado Chanero, Jonuta, Tabasco
descriptionlocal: La comunidad de Poblado Chanero ha elaborado un detallado plan de acción para combatir el alcoholismo, el desempleo y las inundaciones.
description: The community of Chanero village has elaborated a detailed plan of action to tackle alcoholism, unemployment and floods.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA de Ejido Monte Grande, Jonuta, Tabasco
descriptionlocal: La comunidad de Ejido Monte Grande está expuesta a un alto riesgo de inundaciones, dengue y un problema de alcoholismo.
description: The community of Ejido Monte Grande is exposed to a high risk of floods and dengue and also identified the issue of alcoholism.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA de Ranchería La Esperanza, Jonuta, Tabasco
descriptionlocal: Debido a su ubicación entre dos cuerpos de agua, en un lado un río y en el otro lagos, toda la comunidad enfrenta un alto riesgo de inundación y su vía de acceso también  se inunda aislando a la comunidad.
description: Due to its location between two water bodies, on one side a river and lakes on the other, the whole community faces a high risk of flooding and its access road also floods cutting off the community.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA de Puerto Madero, Tapachula, Chiapas
descriptionlocal: La comunidad de Puerto Madero identificó que sus principales vulnerabilidades son la construcción de casas en las orillas del mar y del canal y la vulnerabilidad del centro de salud en relación con al mar.
description: The community of Puerto Madero identified its main vulnerabilities as the construction of houses on the sea and channel shore and the vulnerable position of the health centre in relation to the sea.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA de Ranchería Nuevo Mundo, Jonuta, Tabasco
descriptionlocal: En Jonuta, una región gravemente afectada por inundaciones en 2007, 2008 y 2011, la comunidad de Nuevo Mundo identificó sus principales vulnerabilidades a las inundaciones. Algunas de las cuales son; la construcción de viviendas bajas, la falta de  medios de comunicación con otras áreas y la inundación de su única vía de acceso.
description: In Jonuta, a region severely affected by floods in 2007, 2008 and 2011 the community of Nuevo Mundo identified its main vulnerabilities to floods. Some of which are low built housing, lack of means of communication with other areas and the flooding of their only access route.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA de Ranchería El Pastal, Jonuta, Tabasco
descriptionlocal: En Jonuta, una región gravemente afectada por las inundaciones en 2007, 2008 y 2011, la comunidad de Rancheria el Pastal planea abordar tanto su vulnerabilidad a las inundaciones como la contaminación.
description: In Jonuta, a region severely affected by floods in 2007, 2008 and 2011, the community of Rancheria el Pastal plans to tackle both its vulnerability to floods and to pollution.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA de El Piñal, Jonuta, Tabasco
descriptionlocal: Además del elevado riesgo regional de inundaciones, El Piñal también identificó un alto riesgo de sequía durante los meses secos y por lo tanto, ha planeado tomar medidas para hacer frente a ambos peligros.
description: In addition to a regional high risk of floods, El Piñal identified a high risk of drought during the dry months and therefore, has planned to take actions to face both hazards.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA de San José Terán, Chiapas
descriptionlocal: La comunidad urbana de San José Terán, en las afueras de Tuxtla Gutiérrez, identificó acciones para abordar su vulnerabilidad a las inundaciones, los incendios, el alcoholismo y la drogadicción.
description: The urban community of San José Terán in the outskirts of Tuxtla Gutiérrez identified actions to tackle its vulnerability to floods, fires, alcoholism and drug addiction.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA de Ranchería Torno Largo 1 Seccion A, Jonuta, Tabasco
community: Ranchería Torno Largo 1 Seccion A, Jonuta, Tabasco
descriptionlocal: La comunidad de Torno Largo 1A identificó el centro de salud, las escuelas, las tiendas de alimentación y las canoas como capacidades locales importantes ante las inundaciones.
description: The community of Torno Largo 1A identified the health centre, schools, food shops and canoes as important local capacities, useful when faced with floods.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA de Ranchería Torno Largo 1 Seccion B, Jonuta, Tabasco
community: Ranchería Torno Largo 1 Seccion B, Jonuta, Tabasco
descriptionlocal: La comunidad de Torno Largo 1B en Jonuta, una región gravemente afectada por las inundaciones, identificó las sequías y la contaminación debido a la mala gestión de residuos como peligros adicionales que enfrenta.
description: The community of Torno Largo 1B in Jonuta, a region severely affected by floods, identified droughts and pollution due to bad waste management as additional hazards it faces.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA de Venustiano Carranza, Jonuta, Tabasco.
descriptionlocal: Además del alto riesgo regional de inundaciones, en la comunidad de Venustiano Carranza se identificaron problemas los de salud, las plagas y enfermedades animales y  el desempleo como los riesgos principales.
description: In addition to the regional high risk of floods, in the community of Venustiano Carranza health concerns, pests and animal disease and unemployment were identified as key hazards.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA de Apanaje, Las Sabanas, Madriz
descriptionlocal: Los huracanes, los deslizamientos de tierra, las sequías, el desempleo y la débil organización comunitaria, son algunos de los principales problemas que la comunidad de Apanaje ha identificado y planeado abordar.
description: Hurricanes, landslides, droughts, unemployment and a weak community organisation, are some of the main issues the community of Apanaje has identified and planned to address.
comments: Este AVC  es un buen ejemplo del uso de la herramienta del calendario histórico. A través de esta herramienta, la comunidad de Apanaje ha identificado la percepción de cambios en la temperatura local en los últimos 80 años y cambios en las fechas de inicio de la estación de lluvias y en la cantidad de agua disponible para la comunidad./This VCA is a good example of the use of the tool of historical calendar. Through this tool the community of Apanaje has identified the perception of changes in the local temperature in the last 80 years and changes in both the starting dates of the rainy season and of the amount of water available to the community.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA de Barrio Amado Palma Sector 15, Somoto Madriz
community: Barrio Amado Palma Sector 15, Somoto Madriz
descriptionlocal: La comunidad urbana de Barrio Amado Palma ha identificado las inundaciones, la contaminación ambiental y la inseguridad como los principales problemas a abordar.
description: The urban community of Barrio Amado Palma has identified floods, environmental pollution and insecurity as the main problems to address.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA del Barrio Carlos Fonseca Amador, Región Autónoma del Atlántico Sur
community: El Barrio Carlos Fonseca Amador, Región Autónoma del Atlántico Sur
descriptionlocal: Frente a un riesgo elevado y una alta vulnerabilidad a las inundaciones, la comunidad del Barrio Carlos Fonseca Amador planeó organizar e implementar un plan de prevención de inundaciones, construir un sistema de drenaje y crear un sistema comunitario de alerta temprana.
description: Faced with a high risk and vulnerability to floods the community of Barrio Carlos Fonseca Amador planned to organise and implement a flood prevention plan, build a drainage system and the creation of a community early warning system.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA del Barrio Julio Ramón Miller Sector 14, Somoto, Madriz
community: Barrio Julio Ramón Miller Sector 14, Somoto, Madriz
descriptionlocal: Este AVC identificó los efectos del cambio climático tanto a nivel nacional como local y puso de relieve los problemas de las inundaciones, los residuos y el alcoholismo.
description: This VCA has identified the effects of climate change both at the national and local level and has highlighted the issues of floods, waste and alcoholism.
comments: Este AVC presenta un buen análisis de la información secundaria, también utiliza una serie herramientas diferentes acompañadas de un buen análisis. Asimismo, se realiza una evaluación holística que identifica riesgos y prioridades en diferentes sectores, también se incorporan consideraciones de cambio climático./This VCA and POA has a very good analysis of secondary information, it also uses a number of different tools accompanied with a good analysis. Furthermore, it is a holistic assessment that identifies issues and priorities in different sectors and also incorporates climate change considerations.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA del Barrio Naciones Unidas, Managua
descriptionlocal: La comunidad urbana del Barrio Naciones Unidas ha identificado muchas medidas para abordar su vulnerabilidad ante las inundaciones.
description: The urban community of Barrio Naciones Unidas has identified many actions to tackle its vulnerability to floods.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA del Barrio San Antonio, Juigalpa
descriptionlocal: Las inundaciones y la contaminación del río que atraviesa la comunidad del Barrio San Antonio fueron las principales preocupaciones identificadas en este VCA. Se planificaron acciones como la plantación de árboles y la sensibilización de la población vulnerable.
description: Flooding and pollution of the river that runs through the community of Barrio San Antonio are the main concerns identified in this VCA. Actions such as planting trees and awareness raising with the vulnerable population were planned for.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA de la Comunidad Buena Vista, Las Sabanas, Madriz
community: Comunidad Buena Vista, Las Sabanas, Madriz
descriptionlocal: La comunidad de Buena Vista elaboró un buen plan de acción integral para abordar los problemas de inundaciones, deslizamientos de tierra, sequías e incendios forestales.
description: The community of Buena Vista  elaborated a good and comprehensive action plan to address the issues of flooding, landslides, droughts and forest fires.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA de El Castillo, Las Sabanas, Madriz
descriptionlocal: La gente de Castillo identificó muchas capacidades personales, materiales y naturales dentro de la comunidad tales como carpinteros, maestros, especialistas en manejo de cultivos, una escuela y una buena red hidrográfica.
description: The people of Castillo identified many personal, material and natural capacities within the community such as, carpenters, teachers, specialists in crop management, a school and a good hydrographic network.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA de El Castillito, Las Sabanas Madriz
community: Comunidad El Castillito, Las Sabanas Madriz
descriptionlocal: El Castillito se encuentra en una zona de alto riesgo donde el riesgo más alto es de deslizamientos de tierra, pero también de incendios e inundaciones. La vulnerabilidad de la comunidad se debe principalmente a la construcción de viviendas en laderas y a las actividades agrícolas de la población y a la deforestación.
description: El Castillito is located in a high-risk area where the highest risk is of landslides but also of fires and floods. The community's  vulnerability mainly stems from building houses on slopes and the unsustainable farming activities pursued by the population and the deforestation.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA de El Cipián, Las Sabanas, Madriz
descriptionlocal: La débil integración de la comunidad y la falta de conciencia de los riesgos a los que está expuesta son dos de los desafíos que enfrenta la comunidad de El Cipián para reducir su vulnerabilidad a los riesgos.
description: The weak community integration and lack of awareness of the risks it is exposed to are two of the challenges that the community Cipián faces in order to reduce it's vulnerability to risks.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA de San José de Cusmapa,  Madriz
community: San José de Cusmapa, San José de Cusmapa,  Madriz
descriptionlocal: Los accidentes tecnológicos causados por vehículos, las inundaciones y los deslizamientos de tierra son los principales problemas que destacó la comunidad de San José de Cusmapa.
description: Technological accidents caused by vehicles, floods and landslides are the main issues the community of San Jose de Cusmapa highlighted.
comments: Este VCA es un ejemplo de buenas prácticas en su detallado uso y análisis de herramientas tales como, la matriz de medios de subsistencia. Esta comunidad también ha elaborado un buen plan de acción para hacer frente a los diferentes problemas identificados. Finalmente, la comunidad realizó un importante fuerte esfuerzo para incluir a diferentes sectores de la sociedad como la población indígena./This VCA is an example of good practice in its very detailed use and analysis of tools such as the livelihoods matrix. This community has also elaborated a good and detailed plan of action to deal with many different problems. Finally, the community made strong efforts to include different stakeholders such as the indigenous population.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA de La Fuente,  San José de Cusmapa, Madriz
community: La fuente,  San José de Cusmapa, Madriz
descriptionlocal: En La Fuente se destacaron como prioridades las sequías, los deslizamientos de tierra, el desempleo y los temas de saneamiento.
description: In La Fuente, drought, landslides, unemployment and sanitation issues were highlighted as the main priorities for action.
comments: Este AVC es un ejemplo de buenas prácticas, específicamente debido a su uso del calendario estacional al que la comunidad incorpora una perspectiva de género dividiendo y analizando las actividades realizadas y las horas dedicadas en base al género./This VCA is an example of good practice, specifically due to its use of the seasonal calendar to which the community incorporated a gender perspective by dividing and analysing the activities performed and the hours dedicated according to gender.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA de El Guayabo, Somoto, Madriz
descriptionlocal: La comunidad de El Guayabo identificó muchos peligros que la afectan y priorizó los deslizamientos de tierra, las inundaciones y los incendios forestales como los más importantes.
description: The community of El Guayabo identified many hazards affecting it and prioritised landslides, floods and forest fires as the most important ones.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA de Los Llanitos,  San José de Cusmapa, Madriz
community: Los Llanitos,  San José de Cusmapa, Madriz
descriptionlocal: La comunidad de Los Llanitos identificó las inundaciones, la degradación ambiental y los incendios forestales como sus principales prioridades y diseñó un plan de acción muy detallado para enfrentarlos.
description: The community of Los Llanitos identified floods, environmental degradation and forest fires as its main priorities and designed a very detailed action plan to tackle them.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA de Miramar, Las Sabanas, Madriz
descriptionlocal: En la comunidad de Miramar reconoció sus dos vulnerabilidades principales al peligro de las sequías. Estas son la pérdida de cosechas y la inestabilidad económica que afecta negativamente a la capacidad de prepararse para tiempos de escasez con las reservas de alimentos.
description: In the community of Miramar, loss of crops and economic instability negatively affecting the capacity to prepare for times of scarcity with food reserves, were recognized as its two main vulnerabilities to the hazard of droughts.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA de El Mojón, San José de Cusmapa, Madriz
community: Comunidad El Mojón, San José de Cusmapa, Madriz
descriptionlocal: La mayor vulnerabilidad de El Mojón deriva de la ubicación de las casas en colinas propensas a incendios forestales, deslizamientos e inundaciones.
description: El Mojon's biggest vulnerability derives from the location of houses on hills prone to forest fires, landslides and floods.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA de Puerto Cabezas Barrio Jerusalén
community: Puerto Cabezas Barrio Jerusalén, Región Autónoma del Atlántico Norte.
descriptionlocal: Ante el riesgo y la vulnerabilidad a las inundaciones, esta comunidad planeó trasladar las casas y los cultivos a terrenos más altos, hacer un plan comunal y construir un sistema de drenaje.
description: Faced with a risk of, and vulnerability to, floods this community plans to move houses and crops to higher grounds, make a communal plan and build a drainage system.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA de  El Pegador, Las Sabanas, Madriz
community: Comunidad El Pegador, Las Sabanas, Madriz
descriptionlocal: En El Pegador, los huracanes, la contaminación y los desechos, los terremotos y las sequías se identificaron como los peligros prioritarios que afectan a la comunidad y contra los que se tomará medidas.
description: In El Pegador, hurricanes, pollution and waste, earthquakes and droughts were identified as the priority hazards that affect the community and against which it will take action.
comments: Este AVC de El Pegador es un ejemplo de buenas prácticas, especialmente en su uso del diagrama de Venn, el análisis de redes institucionales y sociales y la evaluación de la capacidad de las organizaciones populares./This VCA from El Pegador is an example of good practice, especially in its use of the Venn diagram, institutional and social network analysis and the assessment of the capacity of people’s organizations.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA de Quebrada Honda, Las Sabanas
descriptionlocal: La comunidad de Quebrada Honda identificó kas capacidades locales como el comité de agua y saneamiento, el comité de padres o la escuela.
description: The community of Quebrada Honda identified local capacities such as the water and sanitation committee, the parents committee or the school.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA de El Rodeo, San José de Cusmapa
community: Comunidad El Rodeo, San José de Cusmapa, Madriz
descriptionlocal: Los incendios forestales son el mayor peligro que afectan a la comunidad de El Rodeo. La creación de un plan de contingencia, la capacitación de una brigada contra los incendios forestales y la organización de grupos de monitoreo forestal son algunas de las acciones planificadas por la comunidad.
description: Forest fires are the biggest hazard affecting the community of El Rodeo. Creating a contingency plan, capacitating a brigade against forest fires and organising groups to monitor the forests are some of the actions planned by the community.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA de Las Sabanas Urbano, Las Sabanas
community: Las Sabanas Urbano, Las Sabanas, Madriz
descriptionlocal: La comunidad urbana de Las Sabanas identificó los incendios estructurales como su principal peligro. La vulnerabilidad a los incendios proviene principalmente de la falta de un plan de acción contra los incendios y la falta de conciencia de la población de los riesgos que los incendios urbanos plantean.
description: The urban community of Las Sabanas identified fires of structures as its main priority hazard. The vulnerability to fires stems mainly form the lack of a plan of action against fires and the lack of awareness among the population of the risks that urban fires pose.

title: AVC y PDA/VCA and POA de la comunidad Valle de Sonís, Somoto
community: Comunidad Valle de Sonís, Somoto, Madriz
descriptionlocal: Las inundaciones, los deslizamientos de tierra y la violencia intrafamiliar son las cuestiones prioritarias a abordar en la comunidad de Valle de Sonis.
description: Floods, landslides and intrafamilial violence are the priority issue to address in the community of Valle de Sonis.

title: AVC/VCA de Salento, Quindio
descriptionlocal: La erupción explosiva del volcán Cerro Machín, las inundaciones repentinas y los deslizamientos de tierra son los principales peligros que afectan a la comunidad. Para hacerles frente, planearon implementar un sistema de alerta temprana y establecer mecanismos de organización comunitaria.
description: The explosive eruption of the volcano Cerro Machín, flash floods and landslides are the main hazards that affect the community. To face them they planned to implement an early warning system and to establish mechanisms of community organisation.

title: VCA and POA of Lethem St. Ignatius
community: Lethem St. Ignatius including Tabatinga and Culvert City
description: The communities of Lethem and St Ignacius have identified actions to take against the hazards of dust inducing poor air quality, lack of road signs, garbage, floods, drought, fires, vector borne diseases and pests.

title: VCA and POA of Maduvvaree and Meedhoo
description: The communities of Maduvvarey and Meedhoo both identified vulnerabilities related to the Maldives’ fragile ecological profile with low elevation and beach erosion, combined with its economic dependence on the tourism and fisheries sectors and poor waste management as key factors contributing to their high risk level.

title: VCA of 46 Wards of Kathmandu valley
description: The 46 communities highlighted earthquake, fire, epidemic and road accident as the most frequent and severe causes of causes death, injury and displacement in the Kathmandu valley.
comments: This VCA shows the diversity of interpretations of the VCA and shows the information of 46 communities in a different way to the traditional VCA

title: VCA of 20  Wards of Kathmandu valley
description: The 20 communities highlighted earthquake, fire, epidemic and road accident as the most frequent and severe causes of causes death, injury and displacement in the Kathmandu valley.
comments: This VCA shows the diversity of interpretations of the VCA and shows the information of 20 communities in a different way to the traditional VCA

title: VCA and POA of Villages of Wali Muhammad Leghari, Zafarabad, Mehrab Qambrani
community: Villages of Wali Muhammad Leghari, Zafarabad, Mehrab Qambrani
description: All three communities identified a high exposure and vulnerability to floods. The main priorities are improving the shelter and drainage system, creating seed banks and building safety walls.

title: VCA and POA of Rumbur (Kalash Valley)
description: The community of Rumbur valley identified as key issues flash floods, the lack of educational facilities and a lack of safe drinking water.

title: VCA of Camiguin Province, Island of Mindanao
description: The devastation caused in Camiguin island by Typhoon Nanang served as a wake-up call to enhance local and community capacity in disaster preparedness and mitigation. Recommendations and actions to improve the evacuation centre are one of the aspects they are focusing on in their action plan.

title: Urban VCA of Uyana South GN Division
community: Uyana South GN Division, Colombo District
description: This community prioritised community development projects related to development of social capital in the community. Out of identified projects, the community preferred to start with the establishment of a community based organization.
comments: This is an example of a VCA with a livelihood and social development focus and that follows a different structure than the traditional VCA

title: VCA of Talalla Central Grama Niladari, Devinuwara DS
community: Talalla Central Grama Niladari, Devinuwara DS, Matara District
description: The VCA process in Talalla identified the lack of long term security in employment, wild pigs and monkeys, dependency on external assistance and market risks as the main threats to the community
comments: This is an example of a VCA with a livelihood  focus and that follows a different structure than the traditional VCA

title: Kurdmashi and Tirdjan  Villages of Ismayilli District
community: Kurdmashi and Tirdjan  Villages of Ismayilli District
description: The communities of Tirjan and Kurdmashi planned actions to address the risks they both face due to floods , landslides and earthquakes.
comments: This is an example of a VCA with a specific focus on hazards. Therefore its structure differs from the traditional VCA.

title: Urban VCA and POA of Faikpasa and Mirali Neighbourhoods Izmir
description: The urban communities of Faikpasa and Mirali have identified and made plans to tackle a broad range of different issues affecting them. One of the highest priorities being addressing the issue of poor garbage disposal systems.
comments: This is a good practice example of VCA because it uses a range of different tools accompanied by a good analysis. In addition, the community identified many priorities in very different sectors.
